welcome.title: Welcome to AngoraSix
welcome.subtitle: Would you like me to show you what this is all about?
welcome.footer: Choose your path and let's build something meaningful together

visionary.title: I have an idea and want to move it forward with good practices
visionary.description: Transform your vision into reality with structured guidance, proven methodologies, and expert support.

cooperative.title: I want to join something that represents a different way of creating
cooperative.description: Be part of a collaborative movement that values transparency, shared ownership, and collective growth.

enthusiast.title: I want to dedicate my time to something that inspires me and makes me feel good
enthusiast.description: Find meaningful work that aligns with your values and contributes to projects that matter.
